name: The Early Years Collected
description:
Artichoke Presents
The Early Years Collected
Comics by Antonio Romero

Visual Storytelling. Sequential Art. Comics! There’s something for everyone in this 164-page anthology. Discover content-driven design, unique graphic exploration, a semi-autobiographical account, ridiculous superhero satire, sophisticated science fiction and a quiet adaption. 

And that’s not all! Check out the sketches and experiments detailing the development of these comics.

In addition to reprinting Flying Solo, Super Duper Ham: Day One and Martian Debut, The Early Years Collected features On The Promenade, Sketches and Streams and Momentos.
